SyntheverseGenesisSYNTH90T.name: Syntheverse SYNTH 90T MOTHERLODE BLOCKMINE
SyntheverseGenesisSYNTH90T.description: Fixed-supply ERC-20. One-time mint to Motherlode Vault. Gold 50% · Silver 25% · Copper 25%. Immutable. No additional minting.

SyntheverseGenesisLensKernel.name: Syntheverse Genesis Lens Kernel
SyntheverseGenesisLensKernel.description: No stored state. Events: Signal, Attestation, Note. Methods: signal(), attest(), note(). Permissionless. Protocol lens for participation and attestations.

designPrinciples: No admin functions — decentralized after deployment
